scope.title: Data Foundations
scope.description: Start with the language, formats, and habits that make data useful across teams.
scope.summary: Start with the language, formats, and habits that make data useful across teams.
learningObjectives: Understand what data is, how it moves, and why teams misinterpret it.
Explain common formats and basic storage and querying choices.
Apply simple quality and stewardship checks to a dataset and a workflow.
Evaluate basic responsible data risks and trade offs.
